item.title: Report I-2024060019
item.description:
Report I-2024060019

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-12T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-29
  • City: San Francisco
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES -ROSALIND SHELMIRE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Halfway through the flight, passenger 20A, HOLUB/ALEXEIDAVID, told FA Pang that their laptop was emitting an electrical smell. FA conferred with FM and both agreed there was a smell. No flames, heat, or smoke were present. Out of an abundance of caution, the MacBook Pro was placed into the TCB. The TCB was placed in an aft Iav and monitored occasionally per CA instructions occasionally throughout the flight. The TCB remained in the aft Iav until descent, in which it was brought to the forward Iav for easy access upon door opening. Due to no signs of fire, smoke, or heat, pax was escorted to the exit and was able to retrieve the laptop out of the TCB. FAs reminded to fill out IORs and thanked for erring on the side of caution. Name: Alex Eidavid Holub Address: 36 Mayflower Drive Wenham MA 01984 , Phone: 626-676-1736 Email: alexholub@gmail.com

  • City: SYLMAR

  • Description: X-2024051644: RESPONDER CALLED FOR HAZMAT LEAKER ON THE BLUE BELT, RESPONDER NOTICED A CLASS 8 CORROSIVE DIAMOND LABEL AND A CLASS 5.1 OXIDIZER LABEL, RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND CONTAIMENT SHEET, WHICH LEAD ME TO FOLLOW THE CHAIN OF COMMAND, QUARATINE OFF THE AREA AND CALLED AN OUTSIDE RESPONDER. X-2024051659: RESPONDER CALLED TO A LEAKER FOR BULK BELT, UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER NOTICED A CLASS 8 CORROSIVE CLASS 5.1 OXIDIZER DIAMOND LABEL, RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND CONTAINMENT SHEET. THEN FOLLOWED THE CHAIN OF COMMAND WHICH THEN LED TO CALLING AN OUTSIDE RESPONDER.

item.title: Report X-2024060112
item.description:
Report X-2024060112

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-12T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-19
  • City: Vernon
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 1500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 5/19/24, we received notification from hub personnel that a foul odor was emitting from ISO tank SUTU 266444. The tank was labeled with the commodity "POLYSULFIDE 9. MARINE POLLUTANT" (UN 3082, HAZMAT), prompting to call out an environmental contractor United Pumping to assess the incident. The responder discovered several loose bolts on the top manway hatch. The product inside the tank appeared to be stable, with no residue or spillover on the top area of the tank. It seems the loose bolts found on the top hatch cover allowed vapor to escape, causing the foul odor. After tightening the bolts, the odor dissipated over some time. The seals on the top hatch remained intact and undamaged.

item.title: Report X-2024060236
item.description:
Report X-2024060236

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-11T15:12:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-04
  • City: OCEANSIDE
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Exterior packaging was wet on one side and on the underside by a thick clear liquid that came from the inside of the package. Inside the 4G box are 4 quantities of 1 gallon plastic bottles containing SEK-Surebond SB-8700 Wet Look Joint Stabilizing Sealer with Anti-fungal. One of the bottles had a streak of liquid leaked on to its body that is coming from under the cap. When the cap was opened, the seal was opened a quarter of the way. The liquid leaked inside the exterior packaging and hardened in an hour. The rest of the bottles were unharmed.

item.title: Report E-2024060054
item.description:
Report E-2024060054

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-11T15:12:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-31
  • City: CERES
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On May 31, 2024, one (1) 5-gallon jug of UN3149 had a loose cap and released approximately one (1) gallon of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from GrayMar Environmental Services (GES) to remediate the impacted site. The crew tightened the cap and utilized absorbent pads to remediate the release. All waste was containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum and the damaged jug was overpacked into one (1) additional 55-gallon drum.

item.title: Report X-2024060348
item.description:
Report X-2024060348

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-10T18:15:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-03
  • City: VAN NUYS
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AN EXPEDITED PACKAGE TO THE UNITED KINGDOM WAS INSPECTED. THERMAL TRACKING LABEL DESCRIBES THE CONTENTS AS A REFURBISHED SCOOTER. INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS REVEALED ONE ROADRUNNER PRO ELECTRIC SCOOTER WITH A RECHARGEABLE LITHIUM ION BATTERY CONTAINED IN THE SCOOTER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THERE IS NO CUSTOMS INVOICE WITH THE SHIPMENT. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM CALIFORNIA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 77R96A, VORO MOTORS, INC., 14350 ARMINTA ST, PANORAMA CITY CA 91402-6869.
